bug.author: ghost(ghost)
bug.summary: Update Python Packages to Latest Version
bug.description:
Update the python packages to latest versions.
Python 3.8.6 pip==20.2.4 https://pypi.org/project/pip/ pyinstaller==4.0 https://pypi.org/project/pyinstaller/ numpy==1.19.2 https://pypi.org/project/numpy/ opencv-python==4.4.0.44 https://pypi.org/project/opencv-python/ pillow==8.0.1 https://pypi.org/project/Pillow/ torch==1.6.0 https://pypi.org/project/torch/ torchvision==0.7.0 https://pypi.org/project/torchvision/ torch & torchvision Nightly (OPTIONAL) pip install --pre torch torchvision -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html
In the following files.
build-release.yml build.yml requirements.txt requirements-cpu.txt requirements-gpu.txt
I will update the list when a new update is available.
